title: Ping consistently above 300+, Hong Kong player
body:
Hi, 
I transferred from NA because I suspected that I could get better ping since I live significantly closer to the OCE than America, however, upon transfer my ping went from ~140 to ~300. I know that there are Garena servers available, but account transfer is not possible. Here is a trace route of 103.240.226.249.

  1     3 ms     3 ms     3 ms  10.0.0.1
  2     7 ms     7 ms     4 ms  n058152149254.netvigator.com [58.152.149.254]
  3     4 ms     9 ms     5 ms  10.193.232.21
  4     8 ms     4 ms     9 ms  wtsc3a074.netvigator.com [218.102.40.74]
  5     5 ms     5 ms    10 ms  hurricaneelectric1-100G.hkix.net [123.255.91.158]
  6   162 ms   165 ms   158 ms  100ge8-2.core1.lax2.he.net [184.105.64.125]
  7   166 ms   168 ms   172 ms  100ge8-2.core1.pao1.he.net [184.105.81.237]
  8   168 ms   169 ms   170 ms  10ge4-1.core1.sjc1.he.net [72.52.92.114]
  9   223 ms   225 ms   237 ms  vocus.gigabitethernet2-13.core1.sjc1.he.net [64.71.184.46]
 10   222 ms   222 ms   221 ms  bundle-153.cor02.sjc01.ca.vocus.net [49.255.255.24]
 11   217 ms   221 ms   225 ms  ten-0-6-0-1.cor01.syd04.nsw.vocus.net.au [114.31.199.49]
 12   217 ms   217 ms   219 ms  ten-2-0-0.bdr03.syd04.nsw.VOCUS.net.au [175.45.72.77]
 13   310 ms   310 ms   309 ms  as6507.cust.bdr03.syd04.nsw.VOCUS.net.au [175.45.107.94]
 14   311 ms   324 ms   317 ms  ae-2.br01.syd01.riotdirect.net [104.160.156.35]
 15   316 ms   311 ms   311 ms  104.160.156.103
 16     *        *        *     Request timed out.

Is there anything I can do to improve my ping?

Cheers

replies.body: Mate, This is OCE. We have the cruddiest internet in the world. There are third world countries with better internet than us (and cheaper). Our NBN is costing us so much and they are still doing the rural areas, not the cities or major areas that actually need it. If I am on NA I use to get 180 ping, now its around 300. Until our over the price internet companies and politicians all pull their socks up, we are going to have overpriced crud internet here. Sorry to hear you xferred. I bet Riot won't even allow you a free xfer back. Money motivates Money
